Docs.summary: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer"> adds a root context to provide a definition of the root object. This class cannot be inherited

remarks.format: ## Remarks The RootContext can be placed on the context stack to represent the object that is the root of the serialization hierarchy. In addition to this instance, the RootContext also contains an expression that can be used to reference the RootContext.
